name: The Thrill of the Fight 2
summary:
🥊 Train Harder. Push Further. Get Fitter.� 
Thrill of the Fight 2 isn’t just boxing — it’s a full-body workout that will push your stamina, reflexes, and endurance like nothing else in VR. Jump into the ring to burn calories, sharpen your mind, and stay motivated through every round.

🔥 NEW in this latest Update:� 
🧠 Multiplayer Lobby System – Choose between Ranked, Casual, or Sparring to match your training goals.� 
🛎️ New Hotel Venue – Keep your workouts fresh with a new immersive arena.� 
🗣️...
